Room.Name: A1
Room.Description: You're in the original room... Why don't you have the torch? Well, it's too dark to see anything, smart move.

Welcome user, this is Project Love Craft... You have found yourself lying on the ground, and it appears you have a bump on the back of your head. As you look around, you only have 3 areas that are visible, and it appears you are stuck in a dungeon or cave of some sort. Once you go forth into this dungeon, you will find objects, it is your choice how to handle them. You will have the ability to receive hints in certain areas; Your first hint is that you must type 'go' and then the word North, West, East or South to move.
Upon further inspection the blood appears to be the wrong color and texture for a human
Have you grabbed the torch yet? (Type "take torch")
You have returned to the original room. There is nothing more to see here.

Exit.Name: East
Exit.Description: There is a stone archway leading east

Exit.Name: South
Exit.Description: The courtyard opens to the South

Item.Name: Torch
Item.Description: The fire of the torch burns slightly greenish in color.

Item.Name: Key
Item.Description: There is a Key on the ground.

Room.Name: A2
Room.Description: The room reeks... You can't see anything... I'd suggest getting a light source.
There is blood dripping from the ceiling... What is happening in this god awful place?
You return to one of the rooms you've been in... Why? There's nothing new in here... EXCEPT THAT SPIDER OH GOD! Nevermind, it's just the blood dripping from the ceiling. Oh man, that was scary.

Item.Name: Stick
Item.Description: There appears to be an object sticking out of the wall.
There appears to be a lightable stick in the wall.
The stick is hand made... interesting.
There is a burning Stick on the wall, illuminating the room.

Room.Description: The room reeks... You can't see anything... I'd suggest getting a light source.
There is a burning torch
You return to one of the rooms you've been in... Why? There's nothing new in here... EXCEPT THAT SPIDER OH GOD! Nevermind, it's just the blood dripping from the ceiling. Oh man, that was scary.

Monster.Name: Shoggoth
Monster.Description: You hear a buggling sound as something squishes across the unlit room
There is a bubbling mass of tissue with hundred of eyes and tentacles shambling through the room. It seems to notice you
The bubbling mass of tissue lays slumpt on the ground with the tentacles limp and the eyes devoid of life.
The smell of something foul and unholy fills this area.
The thing lumbers towards you and you are engulfed in the tissue. A crushing feeling passes quickly as you know no more.
